com.amazon.ags.api
Enum AmazonGamesFeature

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<AmazonGamesFeature>
      com.amazon.ags.api.AmazonGamesFeature
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AmazonGamesFeature>
public enum AmazonGamesFeature
extends java.lang.Enum<AmazonGamesFeature>

Enumeration of features Amazon Games provides. To avoid confusion, list only the features that you actually support. Your customers see a list of GameCircle features in the welcome message when your game starts and in your game's sign in page.

Enum Constant Summary
Achievements
          The achievement service is used.

          The leaderboard service is used.

          The gamedata service is used.

          The whispersync service is used.
